summary: This document consists of email communications regarding a compliance alert related to Darren K. Indyke. The alert was reviewed and cleared by AML Compliance, indicating that there were no issues from an anti-money laundering perspective. The emails involve multiple individuals discussing the clearance process for the alert.

persons.name: Velmir Vejzovic
persons.context: Velmir Vejzovic is an AML Compliance Officer who communicated the clearance of an alert regarding Darren K. Indyke.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Darren K. Indyke is identified as the subject of a compliance alert that was reviewed and cleared by AML Compliance.

persons.name: Vijay-A Sawant
persons.context: Vijay-A Sawant is a recipient of the emails discussing the compliance alert for Darren K. Indyke.

persons.name: Vikram-D Singh
persons.context: Vikram-D Singh is an Analyst who initiated the communication regarding the compliance alert for Darren K. Indyke.

connections.description: Velmir Vejzovic, as an AML Compliance Officer, reviewed and cleared the compliance alert concerning Darren K. Indyke.
Vikram-D Singh communicated with Vijay-A Sawant regarding the compliance alert process.

events.title: Fircosoft Alert for Darren K. Indyke
events.description: An alert was generated for Darren K. Indyke that required compliance review.

events.title: Previous Clearance of Alert
events.description: A previous clearance of an alert concerning Darren K. Indyke was documented.

keyFacts: Darren K. Indyke is a Director at Southern Trust Company Inc. and an indirect owner of Prytanee, LLC.
The compliance alert for Darren K. Indyke was generated on May 31, 2018.
The alert was cleared by AML Compliance on June 1, 2018, based on a previous clearance from October 31, 2017.
Velmir Vejzovic is responsible for communicating the clearance of the alert.
Vikram-D Singh initiated the alert process and required compliance clearance before KYC approval.
